"Raskina": "Oh my, aren't you one of the new ARKS? Hello!"
"In this Shop Area, there's a shop for just about everything an ARKS member needs. Feel free to take a peek!"
"Ah, you must be the one Bruder told me about."
"Well, I'm nothing fancy, but I'll teach you what I know."
"In addition to your main class, ARKS also have the ability to choose a \"Subclass\"."
"Let's see... First, can you please make your way over to the Class Counter?"
"I'll explain more when you get there. Talk to you in a bit!"
"As you progress, the Subclass you choose progresses as well. So whatever class you choose, it won't be for naught."
"How's that? Hopefully I helped you out a little. You show lots of promise, so please keep at it!"
